mapper.select: SELECT re.* FROM sh_resource re LEFT JOIN sh_role_resource rr ON rr.RESOURCE_ID=re.ID LEFT JOIN sh_role ro ON rr.ROLE_ID=ro.ID LEFT JOIN sh_user_role ur ON ur.ROLE_ID=ro.ID LEFT JOIN sh_user u ON u.ID=ur.USER_ID WHERE rr.ENABLE_FLAG=TRUE AND re.ENABLE_FLAG=TRUE AND ro.ENABLE_FLAG=TRUE AND ur.ENABLE_FLAG=TRUE AND u.ENABLE_FLAG=TRUE AND u.ID=#{userId}
